Uses of Interface
org.gridgain.grid.spi.GridSpi

Packages that use GridSpi
org.gridgain.grid.spi Contains common classes and interfaces for SPI implementations. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.authentication Contains APIs for authentication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.authentication.noop Contains default no-op implementation for authentication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.checkpoint Contains APIs for checkpoint SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.checkpoint.cache Contains cache-based implementation for checkpoint SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.checkpoint.jdbc Contains JDBC implementation for checkpoint SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.checkpoint.s3 Contains S3-based implementation for checkpoint SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.checkpoint.sharedfs Contains default shared file system implementation for checkpoint SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision Contains APIs for collision SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.fifoqueue Contains default FIFO based collision SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.jobstealing Contains job stealing collision SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.priorityqueue Contains priority based collision SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication Contains APIs for grid communication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication.tcp Contains default TCP/IP-based implementation for communication SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment Contains APIs for deployment SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.local Contains default local deployment SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.uri Contains URI-based deployment SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery Contains APIs for topology manager SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.multicast Contains default IP-multicast implementation for discovery SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.discovery.tcp Contains TCP/IP implementation for discovery SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.eventstorage Contains APIs for event storage SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.eventstorage.memory Contains default in-memory implementation for event storage SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover Contains APIs for failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.always Contains default "always" failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.jobstealing Contains job stealing failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.never Contains "never" failover SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing Contains APIs for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.adaptive Contains adaptive load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.roundrobin Contains default round-robin implementation for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.weightedrandom Contains weighted random-base implementation for load balancing SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.metrics Contains APIs for metrics SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.metrics.jdk Contains default basic JVM-based metrics SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.securesession Contains APIs for secure session SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.securesession.noop Contains default no-op implementation for secure session SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.swapspace Contains APIs for swap space SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.swapspace.file Contains default file-based swap space SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.swapspace.leveldb Contains LevelDB swap space SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology Contains APIs for topology SPI. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.attributes Contains attributes based topology SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.basic Contains default basic topology SPI implementation. 
org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology.nodefilter Contains topology SPI implementation based on filtering node metrics. 
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi that implement GridSpi
 class GridSpiAdapter
          This class provides convenient adapter for SPI implementations.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.authentication
 

Subinterfaces of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.authentication
 interface GridAuthenticationSpi
          Authentication SPI used for authenticating grid nodes and remote clients.

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.authentication.noop that implement GridSpi
 class GridNoopAuthenticationSpi
          Default implementation of the authentication SPI which permits any request.

          Checkpoint SPI provides an ability to save an intermediate job state.

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision
 

Subinterfaces of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision
 interface GridCollisionSpi
          Collision SPI allows to regulate how grid jobs get executed when they arrive on a destination node for execution.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.fifoqueue
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.fifoqueue that implement GridSpi

          This class provides implementation for Collision SPI based on FIFO queue.

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.jobstealing that implement GridSpi
 class GridJobStealingCollisionSpi
          Collision SPI that supports job stealing from over-utilized nodes to under-utilized nodes.

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.collision.priorityqueue that implement GridSpi

          This class provides implementation for Collision SPI based on priority queue.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication
 

Subinterfaces of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication
 interface GridCommunicationSpi
          Communication SPI is responsible for data exchange between nodes.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication.tcp
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.communication.tcp that implement GridSpi
 class GridTcpCommunicationSpi
          GridTcpCommunicationSpi is default communication SPI which uses TCP/IP protocol and Java NIO to communicate with other nodes.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment
 

Subinterfaces of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment
 interface GridDeploymentSpi
          Grid deployment SPI is in charge of deploying tasks and classes from different sources.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.local
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.local that implement GridSpi
 class GridLocalDeploymentSpi
          Local deployment SPI that implements only within VM deployment on local node via GridLocalDeploymentSpi.register(ClassLoader, Class) method.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.uri
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.deployment.uri that implement GridSpi
 class GridUriDeploymentSpi
          Implementation of GridDeploymentSpi which can deploy tasks from different sources like file system folders, FTP, email and HTTP.

 interface GridFailoverSpi
          Failover SPI provides developer with ability to supply custom logic for handling failed execution of a grid job.

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.always that implement GridSpi
 class GridAlwaysFailoverSpi
          Failover SPI that always reroutes a failed job to another node.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.jobstealing
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.jobstealing that implement GridSpi
 class GridJobStealingFailoverSpi
          Job stealing failover SPI needs to always be used in conjunction with GridJobStealingCollisionSpi SPI.
 

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.never
 

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.failover.never that implement GridSpi
 class GridNeverFailoverSpi
          This class provides failover SPI implementation that never fails over.

          Load balancing SPI provides the next best balanced node for job execution.

          Load balancing SPI that adapts to overall node performance.

Classes in org.gridgain.grid.spi.loadbalancing.roundrobin that implement GridSpi
 class GridRoundRobinLoadBalancingSpi
          This SPI iterates through nodes in round-robin fashion and pick the next sequential node.

          Load balancing SPI that picks a random node for job execution.

          Secure session SPI allows for session creation and validation, typically after authentication has successfully happened.

          Default no-op implementation of the secure session SPI which supports all subject types and denies any token.

Uses of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology
 

Subinterfaces of GridSpi in org.gridgain.grid.spi.topology
 interface GridTopologySpi
          Topology SPI allows developer to have a custom logic deciding what specific set of grid nodes (topology) is available to GridGain in any given point of time.
